Package com.example.popsicle.models

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.popsicle.models.Constants
  • public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    Constants Class is to store the Constants values necessary for the elements in the Universe, such as the pixel movement that the Syrup or Character moves, the width and height of the elements (characters, clouds, popsicles, syrups, consoles), and the screen size of the emulator device.

    • Field Detail

      • syrupMovementPixelsX

        public static int syrupMovementPixelsX
        The movement of the Syrup. Each time a Syrup move, it is incremented by this value.

      • charMovementPixels

        public static int charMovementPixels
        The movement of the Character. Each time a Character move, it is incremented by this value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Constants

        public Constants()
        Constants constructor to get the screenX (width) and screenY (height) of the device emulator. For unit testing purposes, since there is no device, we set the default width to be 1080 px and the height to be 1794 px.
